```{r, echo=FALSE}

fb = params$fieldbook
dp = params$dependent
id = params$independent

fb$INSTN <- as.factor(fb$INSTN)

```

The independent variable is **`r id`**; the dependent variable is **`r dp`**,
its range is from **`r range(fb[[dp]])[1]`** to **`r range(fb[[dp]])[2]`**
